roleset.name: cause to meet

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John reintroduced Mary to the pleasures of chocolate ice cream.
example.arg: the pleasures of chocolate ice cream

roleset.note: To my mind, "reintroduce" takes two almost-symmetrical arguments; that is, if arg1 is reintroduced to arg2, logically arg2 is reintroduced to arg1 as well. Further, there are complicated figure-ground and intentionality relations to worry about also. To AVOID all of that, take a purely *syntactic* approach to the arg1/arg2 distinction: arg2 is reintroduced by "to".
